page.title: 15Further Education Colleges
page.content: Located among suburban development is the Barry College of further Education which was opened in 1959. It provides further education courses for the western part of South glamorgan including Barry, Caerau, Cowbridge, ely, Llantwit Major and Penarth. Some 2900 students are enrolled each year. The largest number of studens are in the 16-19 year age range but there are students of every age. The college has four facilities : Department of commerce and liberal studies; department of catering studies; construction and science department and the engineering department. The first of these includes secretarial courses, diplomas in business studies, administration and training for potential library assistants.
